title: Spatial Learning and Navigation Map Design: Multimedia-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental geographic concepts and proficiency in using digital maps
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to apply spatial cognition and map design principles to practical tasks for current industry professionals

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the differences between various map types (north-up/heading-up) and guidance indicators.
Learners can establish route plans in virtual spaces with over 80% accuracy using multimedia map tools.
Learners can design practical navigation systems by applying map design principles for improving user experience.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
